top_stories.title: Google partners with Ambani’s Reliance to offer free AI Pro access to millions of Jio users in India
top_stories.description: U.S. tech giants increasingly view India as the next big frontier — a place to gather diverse data, refine models, and test AI use cases that could later scale across other emerging markets.
top_stories.author: Jagmeet Singh
top_stories.content: U.S. tech giants increasingly view India as the next big frontier — a place to gather diverse data, refine models, and test AI use cases that could later scale across other emerging markets.

top_stories.title: Beyond pilots: A proven framework for scaling AI to production
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore the Five V's Framework—a field-tested methodology that has helped 65% of AWS Generative AI Innovation Center customer projects successfully transition from concept to production, with some launching in just 45 days. The framework provides a structured approach through Value, Visualize, Validate, Verify, and Venture phases, shifting focus from "What can AI do?" to "What do we need AI to do?" while ensuring solutions deliver measurable business outcomes and sustainable...
top_stories.author: Sri Elaprolu, Sabine Khan, Diego Socolinsky, Andrea Jimenez Fernandez, and Randi Larson
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore the Five V's Framework—a field-tested methodology that has helped 65% of AWS Generative AI Innovation Center customer projects successfully transition from concept to production, with some launching in just 45 days. The framework provides a structured approach through Value, Visualize, Validate, Verify, and Venture phases, shifting focus from "What can AI do?" to "What do we need AI to do?" while ensuring solutions deliver measurable business outcomes and sustainable...

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Launches Omniverse DSX Blueprint, Enabling Global AI Infrastructure Ecosystem to Build Gigawatt-Scale AI Factories
top_stories.description: During the GTC Washington, D.C., keynote today, NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang introduced NVIDIA Omniverse DSX, a comprehensive, open blueprint for designing and operating gigawatt-scale AI factories — validated at the new AI Factory Research Center at Digital Realty’s site in Manassas, Virginia. The blueprint brings together ecosystem partners across the industry that are Read Article

top_stories.title: NVIDIA AI Physics Transforms Aerospace and Automotive Design, Accelerating Engineering by 500x
top_stories.description: Leading technology companies in aerospace and automotive are accelerating their engineering design processes with the NVIDIA DoMINO NIM microservice, part of the NVIDIA PhysicsNeMo AI physics framework. By integrating GPU-accelerated computing, NVIDIA PhysicsNeMo and interactive digital twin technologies, enterprises are accelerating their modeling and simulation workflows by up to 500x over traditional methods, speeding innovation Read Article

top_stories.title: NVIDIA’s 260,000 GPUs to Supercharge South Korea’s AI Ambitions
top_stories.description: Samsung, Hyundai, SK Group and NAVER to lead this national drive to build massive AI Infrastructure. The post NVIDIA’s 260,000 GPUs to Supercharge South Korea’s AI Ambitions appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
